results.title: The effect of metformin on androgen production in diabetic women with non-classic congenital adrenal hyperplasia.
results.text_hl: The effect of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ on androgen production in @DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus @DISEASE_MESH:D003920 @@@diabetic@@@ @SPECIES_9606 @@@women@@@ with @<m>DISEASE_Congenital_adrenal_hyperplasia_due_to_21_hydroxylase_deficiency</m> @DISEASE_MESH:C535979 @@@non-classic congenital adrenal hyperplasia@@@.

citations.NLM: Krysiak R, Okopien B. The effect of metformin on androgen production in diabetic women with non-classic congenital adrenal hyperplasia. Exp Clin Endocrinol Diabetes. 2014 Nov;122(10):568-71. PMID: 25054311

results.title: Metformin-responsive classic salt-losing congenital adrenal hyperplasia due to 21-hydroxylase deficiency: a case report.
results.text_hl: @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Metformin@@@-responsive classic @DISEASE_Adrenal_Hyperplasia_Congenital @DISEASE_MESH:D000312 @@@salt-losing congenital adrenal hyperplasia@@@ due to @<m>DISEASE_Congenital_adrenal_hyperplasia_due_to_21_hydroxylase_deficiency</m> @DISEASE_MESH:C535979 @@@21-hydroxylase deficiency@@@: a case report.

citations.NLM: Mapas-Dimaya AC, Agdere L, Bahtiyar G, Mejia JO, Sacerdote AS. Metformin-responsive classic salt-losing congenital adrenal hyperplasia due to 21-hydroxylase deficiency: a case report. Endocr Pract. 2008 Oct;14(7):889-91. PMID: 18996819

results.title: The Effect of Simvastatin on Plasma Steroid Hormone Levels in Metformin-Treated Women with Non-Classic Congenital Adrenal Hyperplasia.
results.text_hl: Our results suggest that @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@-statin combination therapy may be useful in the management of symptomatic @SPECIES_9606 @@@women@@@ with @<m>DISEASE_Congenital_adrenal_hyperplasia_due_to_21_hydroxylase_deficiency</m> @DISEASE_MESH:C535979 @@@NC-CAH@@@.

citations.NLM: Krysiak R, Kowalcze K, Bednarska-Czerwińska A, Okopień B. The Effect of Simvastatin on Plasma Steroid Hormone Levels in Metformin-Treated Women with Non-Classic Congenital Adrenal Hyperplasia. Exp Clin Endocrinol Diabetes. 2016 Apr;124(4):215-9. PMID: 26824284
citations.BibTeX: @article{26824284, title={The Effect of Simvastatin on Plasma Steroid Hormone Levels in Metformin-Treated Women with Non-Classic Congenital Adrenal Hyperplasia.}, author={Krysiak R and Kowalcze K and Bednarska-Czerwińska A and Okopień B}, journal={Exp Clin Endocrinol Diabetes}, volume={124}, number={4}, pages={215-9}}

results.title: Roux-en-Y gastric bypass in the treatment of non-classic congenital adrenal hyperplasia due to 11-hydroxylase deficiency.
results.text_hl: Therapies such as @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@, @CHEMICAL_Thiazolidinediones @CHEMICAL_MESH:D045162 @@@thiazolidinediones@@@ and lifestyle alterations improve @DISEASE_Insulin_Resistance @DISEASE_MESH:D007333 @@@IR@@@ and also ameliorate the biochemical and clinical abnormalities of @<m>DISEASE_Congenital_adrenal_hyperplasia_due_to_21_hydroxylase_deficiency</m> @DISEASE_MESH:C535979 @@@NCAH@@@, much as they do in @DISEASE_Polycystic_Ovary_Syndrome @DISEASE_MESH:D011085 @@@polycystic ovarian syndrome@@@ (@DISEASE_Polycystic_Ovary_Syndrome @DISEASE_MESH:D011085 @@@PCOS@@@).

citations.NLM: Kalani A, Thomas N, Sacerdote A, Bahtiyar G. Roux-en-Y gastric bypass in the treatment of non-classic congenital adrenal hyperplasia due to 11-hydroxylase deficiency. BMJ Case Rep. 2013 Mar 18;2013():. PMID: 23513016
citations.BibTeX: @article{23513016, title={Roux-en-Y gastric bypass in the treatment of non-classic congenital adrenal hyperplasia due to 11-hydroxylase deficiency.}, author={Kalani A and Thomas N and Sacerdote A and Bahtiyar G}, journal={BMJ Case Rep}, volume={2013}}
